title: Calming Potion
summaries: The Calming Potion is a buff potion which grants the Calm buff when consumed. While under its effects, the enemy spawn rate is reduced by 17% and the max amount of enemies on screen is reduced by 20%. This lasts for 12 minutes () / 8 minutes (), but can be canceled at any time by right-clicking the icon ([img:Desktop version] [img:Legacy tModLoader version]), by selecting the icon and canceling it in the equipment menu ([img:Console version] [img:Old-gen console version]), by double-tapping the buff icon ([img:Mobile version]), or by canceling the buff from the buffs screen ([img:Nintendo 3DS version]).
This potion does not reduce enemy spawn rates during the <linked>Pumpkin Moon</linked>, <linked>Frost Moon</linked>, or <linked>Frost Legion</linked> <linked>events</linked>.
